pageProduct.name: Vital Life Immune shot with Lactoferrin, Manuka Honey + Vitamin C
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Your best shot at immune support.

Deliciously soothing and easy to take, the new innovative grab-and-go Immune Shot integrates seamlessly into your day. Take it anywhere, anytime.

VITAL LIFE™ Immune Shot is the world-first combination of:

 Ultra pure, premium, Australian Lactoferrin: An immune system protein that coordinates and deploys our army of immune cells to help fight off infection?.
Manuka honey: Valued for its high mineral content, antibacterial and antioxidant properties.
Vitamin C: A potent antioxidant used by several bodily processes. Deficiency can result in lowered immunity and a greater susceptibility to infection.

Simply bend, snap and squeeze to give your body an Immune Shot – your way!

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your healthcare professional. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Common Uses

Easily incorporated into your daily routine, VITAL LIFE Immune Shots are used to support your immunity & keep you feeling your best- year round.

Ingredients

Manuka Honey, PUREnFERRIN™ (Lactoferrin), Vitamin C.

Directions

Simply bend, snap and squeeze into your mouth. Consume 1-2 shots daily
